pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Got2b Dry Shampoo Foam 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schwarzkopf got2b Silky Foam Dry Shampoo is a quick drying & cleansing foam for roots and length. It freshens and smoothes your hair. It contains no visible residues.

It's got to be got2b.

Look fresh in no time! Refresh your style in an instant between washes with got2b Silky Foam Dry Shampoo. It quickly cleans & refreshes your hair, leaving it smelling like it's just been washed. This foam dry shampoo leaves no visible residue, just a beautiful silky hair feel. The formula absorbs oil and dries instantly. Be fresh, style fresh!

Size: 140g

Propellant: Hydrocarbon

Warnings

Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Do not spray into eyes. Keep away from all polished or painted surfaces.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children. Use in well ventilated places. Use in short bursts. Do not spray into eyes. Do not inhale intentionally.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

Danger. Pressurised container: May burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect torn sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C/ 122°F.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau), Alcohol denat., Butane, Distarch Phosphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Propane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Isobutane Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Chloride, Panthenol, Lactic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol.

Directions

Shake can well before use. Apply on dry hair. Dispense foam into hands and use your fingertips to massage the foam into your roots and distribute evenly throughout hair. No blow-drying needed.

1. Shake.
2. Dispense.
3. Massage in.

USAGE ADVICE

Make it last: Always close the cap & store in a dry place. If the nozzle clogs, run it under warm water & then dry it thoroughly before use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Always close the cap & store in a dry place.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
